summary: This bill, the Adoption Tax Credit Refundability Act of 2025, amends the Internal Revenue Code to make the adoption tax credit refundable. It renumbers the existing adoption tax credit provision (Section 23) to Section 36C and moves it to the refundable credit section. The bill includes conforming amendments, specifies a standardized third-party affidavit for adoption verification, and sets the effective date for taxable years beginning after December 31, 2024. A transitional rule is included addressing carryforward credits.
